document_data.Description: Much of the abbey is ruined with many gaps in the outer curtain wall.  Some of the inner buildings remain intact and these are occupied by a small number of priests.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1480}}, Rosestone Abbey was the site of a battle between forces loyal to the rightful Harmach of [[Hulburg]] under the command of [[Kara Hulmaster]] and those of the shadow [[mage]] [[Rhovann]] and his puppet [[Maroth Marstel]]. The loyalist army won the battle after [[Geran Hulmaster]] destroyed a magical device that animated dozens of [[golem]] soldiers in Rhovann's army.
